name: Crystal Cabochette Snowman
description:
This festive snowman radiates the the joy of Christmas, rejoicing in that ﬁrst magical snow that falls like diamond dust, creating a glittery winter wonderland. 
This snowman sports 3 crystal buttons featuring some of Swarovskiʼs newer colours with a stunning new crystal “cabochette” 20mm drop to match. 
This snowman is childlike: playful, gleeful, throwing his hands in the air, happy that Christmas has arrived.

(The smaller version shown in Photos 2 & 3, is available by request only)

name: Dangly Leg Santa
description:
Christmas 2013 marks the launch of the Dangly Leg Santa.
It joins previous “danglers”: angels and aliens, with legs that swing from side to side. 
Perfect for the Santa collector on your Christmas list, this ornament will delight both young and old.

Measures 3.75” tall.

name: Crystal Button Snowman
description:
Always a crowd pleaser during the Christmas Holidays, this snowman is adorned with silver plated wire arms which are easy to remove and clean. 
One of my all time bestsellers.  Add some colour to your Christmas tree or Holiday decor with one of my Crystal Button Snowmen featuring Swarovski crystals.

4.25” tall

Make your selection below:

name: Glitter Snowman
description:
This is a bigger version of last yearʼs popular snowman that literally ﬂew off the trees and into the hearts & homes of my customers. 
So this year, I made sure it came in 4 collectible styles! 

These fun, frosty snowmen delight kids young and old, and yeah, they sure seek attention and hog the spotlight. They add sparkle to Christmas presents for anyone on your Xmas list: teachers love them!
 
Having a new baby? Check out the 2 glitterless versions featuring baby blue, and powder pink soft chenille scarves for babyʼs 1st Christmas. (See 2nd photo below)

name: Coloured Penguins
description:
Penguins have arrived, and are taking over in style! Yes the "new black" is colour... and loads of it!  Bright, Bold,Vibrant colour, or Soft, Sensitive, Pastel colour ... and everything in between.

Penguins are a “hot” property, so to keep up with demand I expanded my penguin line in so many colours- you may want to decorate your whole tree with these cute birds! 

Pick & choose colours to match your friendsʼ and familiesʼ favourites (donʼt forget yourself) 

An added bonus: Iʼve created my ﬁrst ever glow in the dark ornament, and itʼs a penguin! (See Photo #3)

(These will be around all year in case you need to add to your collection, or... rookery...)

options.name: Black & White- Glow In Dark Tummy
Black & White w/ gold & silver glitter

name: Little Drop Santa
description:
This roly poly Santa reminds me of my Scandinavian heritage: 
a jolly, happy Gnome with a longer red hat, and a larger red nose, and full of the Christmas Spirit. 
An added detail is the warm glow of his glittered hat band, and glossy glow of his red body. 
Find a special spot on your Christmas tree for this happy, gentle soul.

He measures 4” long

name: Mini Crystal Snowman
description:
Bling! Bling! Christmas Bling!
This snowman is the younger cousin of the larger 30mm Swarovski crystal snowman. 
The base is a gorgeous 20mm Swarovski twist Crystal AB body. 

Choose from a variety of colours below, but, & itʼs a big but - these will only be available as a Limited Edition for Christmas 2013. 

Each is ﬁnished with an elegant silk hanging cord. 

So.... add some "bling" to your Christmas tree or atop a special present this year with one of these sparkling snowmen! The early bird gets the worm... so they say (while supplies last.)

name: Glitter Striped Aliens
description:
2012's breakout hit returns for 2013 with more colours and different glass bases.   These retro inspired aliens have spinning top shaped glass ornament bases or round bases with glittered stripe bands - perfect to match with the variety of alien skin tones out there in the universe....  so many colours to choose from. Each is finished with beautiful silk hanging cord.

Fun for Christmas, and all year round!  Start your collection today!

2.5” tall

options.name: Light Pearl Blue Skin on blue/silver base

name: Celestial Angels
description:
What would Christmas be without angels?  These simple angel ornaments  come in 2 sizes and a variety of skin tones: light, medium or dark, and 2 different colours of glittered wings: gold or white. Each holds a gold star charm.

2" shorter full figured or 4” tall bodied

See choices below:

options.name: Light skin tone with White Glittered wings
Light skin tone with Gold Glittered wings
Med. skin tone with White Glittered wings
Med. skin tone with Gold Glittered wings
Dark skin tone with White Glittered wings
Dark skin tone with Gold Glittered wings
Full ﬁgured Light skin tone with White Glittered Wings
Full ﬁgured Light skin tone with Gold Glittered Wings
Full ﬁgured Medium skin tone with White Glittered Wings
Full ﬁgured Medium skin tone with Gold Glittered Wings
Full figured Dark skin tone with White Glittered Wings
Full figured Dark skin tone with Gold Glittered Wings

name: Snowman with Crystal Bow Tie
description:
These jolly snowman are all decked out in their finest garb- perhaps a New Year’s gala? Tophat, crystal bowties and swarovski crystal buttons, and million dollar smiles. This new version was inspired by the longer icicle versions created a few years ago.... and in 2013, have them back with a new look check out the added photo to see them!

Make your selection below:

options.name: Long Icicle w/ black top hat
Long Icicle w/ red top hat
Long Icicle w/ blue top hat

name: Large Jingle Snowmen - Canadian Version
Shell Santa
description:
These perennial favourites are made from a fine ribbed shell to create the beard, then each of the faces is molded and shaped to give each one a unique expression. These are a Christmas classic.

2.0” tall

See choices below:

name: Reindeer with Sleigh bells
description:
Back in time for the 2013 Christmas rush, is this popular reindeer!
World renowned for pulling Santa Claus' sleigh, these reindeer have antlers glittered in platinum glitter, and sport a sleigh bell harness. These can be hung as an ornament, or can be a stand alone figurine.  Perfect for your Christmas Village.

They measure @ 2.75” tall from hoof to antlers.

name: Rusty Angels
description:
These angels have rustic tin wings and come in 2 varieties: tall and full ﬁgured. Each holds a tiny gold star charm. Perfect for someone who collects rustic and country charm ornaments, or an angel collector. Country Christmas chic for you and yours.  Click on photos to see the variations.
 
Measures @ 4” tall for long bodied or 2" Shorter Full Figured

Make your selection below:

name: Glass Finial Snowman
description:
This festive snowman is formed atop a ribbed glass ﬁnial. The glass is either clear or frosted- you decide which you prefer by selecting when you order.   He sports a large red bow around his neck and his hat is accented with a sprig of glittery holiday cheer.   
Are you a Snowman, Angel or Santa collector at Christmas? 

@ 4.75 tall

name: Large Jinglehead Snowman
description:
The name says it all. Large white jingle bells form the head, and the clay facial features are applied. Very popular with kids - young and old. 

Adorned with a tiny heart on his hatband.
3.5” tall

name: Striped Elves
description:
These happy elves have been inspired by retro vintage style glass christmas ornaments ﬂecked with white glittery stripes. Clean and simple design with a little gold jingle bell embellishment.  (Also have a limited number of larger ones @ 5.5 " tall in the same colours as shown in Pic #3 @$34.50 each, please enquire.)

**These elves are featured in the 2013 #CircleCraft Christmas Market promotional postcard & bus poster campaign in Vancouver!**

They look great as a set.
2.75” tall

Choose your colour below:

name: Glitter Toque Snowman
description:
The bestseller of all my bestsellers - these glitter toque snowmen bring smiles to young and old alike. Each facial feature is a finger rolled piece of clay and is not drawn or painted on.

Available in many colours, add some glitz to your home decor this season with one of my Glitter Toque snowmen.

4” tall

name: Crystal Santas
description:
These popular Santas are made with 20mm Feng Shui Swarovski crystal, and are bound to bring good luck and fortune to your family during the coming year. 
Many customers have informed me they hang these guys up and leave them up all year round.  I am always amazed at how the faintest of light is picked up by the crystal. 
He also sports a tiny red crystal nose.  These are a beautiful gift for a special friend.

2” tall

Make your selection below:

name: Polka Dot Jingle Santas
description:
These jolly Santas have a jingle bell base and embody the spirit of Christmas. Playful and colourful, your kids will love these. (Polka dots are made of finger rolled clay, those on the bell are painted on.) They make a thoughtful gift.

They measure 2.5” tall

Choose your colour below:

name: Polka Dot Glass Snowman
description:
These festive snowmen are the life of the party! The polka dots on his hat are Swarovski crystal stones. This makes a great hostess gift for your Holiday gift giving.   I have created 3 different versions: red, white, and new for 2011: Blue!  Christmas is coming...

Measure 4” tall

Choose your colour below:

name: Mini Jingle Snowman
description:
These tiny snowmen ornaments have a jingle bell base, and are perfect for a feather tree, or to attach to presents as a token gift. Many customers hide them in their childrenʼs stockings. Great for Holiday Gift giving!
2013 will be the last year for the jingle version, 2014 will see a clay base.
**I am selling 4 limited edition advent calendars with special edition clay based snowmen sets, if you're interested, please enquire **

1.5” long

Choose your selection below:

name: Crystal Polka Dot Snowman
description:
Add some bling to your Christmas tree with these festive elves.  These are my Faberge inspired snowmen encrusted with Swarovski crystal stones. (I can never seem to make enough of these.)  Perfect for those who enjoy the magic of crystal adorning their trees and homes for the Holidays.

Available in many colour combinations, and check out my Chanel inspired snowmen with opaque Swarovksi stones on a black background. They even have a tiny red crystal nose, and a silk hanger.
3.0” tall

All stones are on white bodies, unless otherwise noted.

Make your selection below:

options.name: Black body w/ Gold metallic Stones
Black body w/ Silver metallic stones
Black body w/ Mint alabaster stones
Black body w/ Pink Alabaster stones
Black body w/ Jet Black Stones

name: White Shell Angels
description:
I have created these alabaster effect angels from scallop shells and white clay. Each ornament is unique due to each shells' one of a kind nature. Each holds a crystal flower. Each sold separately. Perfect for Christmas, or keeping up year round.

2.5” tall

Choose your colour below:
